title: 73. AITC: The Built Form and Governmental Form with Prem Chandavarkar
itunes:title: 73. AITC: The Built Form and Governmental Form with Prem Chandavarkar
description: This week we continue our ongoing miniseries Architecture in the Time of Coronavirus with architect and theorist Prem Chandavarkar. In this episode, we dissect how the Corona virus highlights marginalized communities, how it changes the ways in which we think about governance, and we ask what are the mechanisms by which we construct the notion of the city?
content:encoded: This week we continue our ongoing miniseries Architecture in the Time of Coronavirus with architect and theorist Prem Chandavarkar.
